head.title: Pullback Would Increase Violence, General Says

hedline.hl1: Pullback Would Increase Violence, General Says

block.p: The top military commander in Iraq, Gen. David H. Petraeus, warned that an American troop pullback this fall would lead to an escalation in sectarian killings and worsening violence. Although General Petraeus did not address the political debate over a withdrawal deadline, he was clearly making a case for more time to put the new security plan into full effect. Page A16.
